creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
description: three large characters, written horizontally across a rectangular page; signature with two characters arranged vertically at far L; red-orange rectangular intaglio stamp URC; square relief stamp at far L
markings: URC, rectangular intaglio: 〇〇堂; L center, square relief: 南岸 {Nangan}
title: The Way Compels Frugality
